name: Dave: The Lost City
description:
Dave The Lost City is a Noir-style action adventure game with Pixel Art.

In this game you will know the story of Dave and his brother William.

Dave one, selfish guy who whenever he does well is an excellent detective is always hired to solve the toughest cases.

His brother William, on the other hand, is Gentle and Unselfish, William is a geologist who made a discovery that caught the attention of Helena a very powerful and influential woman.

The story begins when William disappears without a trace, two years pass until Dave decides to take on the case to find his brother. On his journey Dave discovers that not everything is what it seems.
